23-004SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, January 26, 2023.A motion was made by Commissioner Skye, seconded by Commissioner Coffee, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Sona Coffee, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Coby Skye, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 4 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Kirk Kunihiro and Alan TolkoffCommissioner Dillon joined the meeting.2.

23-005SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from City Staff on Earth Month Activities and Green Business Recognitions.Meredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, City Manager Department, spoke; and continued the PowerPoint presentation.Commissioner Skye left the meeting.Fern Nueno, Climate Manager, City Manager Department, spoke; and continued the PowerPoint presentation.Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, City Manager Department, spoke; and continued the PowerPoint presentation.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, City Manager Department, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Gaytan and Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, City Manager Department.Page 2 of 11411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDTHE BEACH CONFERENCE RM2ND FL, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, APRIL 27, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Coffee, seconded by Commissioner Gaines, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Sona Coffee, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 4 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Kirk Kunihiro, Coby Skye and Alan Tolkoff3.

23-006SC.summary: Recommendation to review the 2023 Office of Climate Action & Sustainability Work Plan, provide input to staff, and forward to theCity Council for approval.Meredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager, spoke.Fern Nueno, Climate Manager, City Manager Department, spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.Fern Nueno, Climate Manager, City Manager Department, spoke.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Gaytan and Fern Nueno, Climate Manager, City Manager Department.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Meredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Coffee and Meredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.Fern Nueno, Climate Manager, City Manager Department, spoke.Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, City Manager Department, spoke.Meredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager, spoke.Page 3 of 11411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDTHE BEACH CONFERENCE RM2ND FL, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, APRIL 27, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESChair Wheeler spoke.Vice Chair Gaytan declared a recess at 5:46 p.m.Chair Wheeler called the meeting back to order at 5:48 p.m.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.Meredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager, spoke.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Gaytan and Meredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Meredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager, spoke.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Gaytan and Meredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.Meredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager, spoke.Fern Nueno, Climate Manager, City Manager Department, spoke.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Gaytan and Commissioner Coffee.Page 4 of 11411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDTHE BEACH CONFERENCE RM2ND FL, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, APRIL 27, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESMeredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager, spoke.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Fern Nueno, Climate Manager, City Manager Department, spoke.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.Erin spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Coffee, seconded by Vice Chair Gaytan, to approve recommendation, as amended, to accept the 2023 Office of Climate Action & Sustainability Work Plan, with an update to the Implement Climate Action Plan Actions section to include BE-8 to implement short-term measures to reduce emissions related to oil and gas extraction, add an item to explore support for expanding air quality monitoring, and forward to City Council for approval.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Sona Coffee, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 4 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Kirk Kunihiro, Coby Skye and Alan Tolkoff4.

23-007SC.summary: Recommendation to approve revisions to the Sustainable City Commission Rules and Procedures to adjust the Commission’s meeting schedule and revise the Commission Rules and Procedures to be consistent with Long Beach Municipal Code 1.08.150.Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, City Manager Department, spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Wheeler and Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, City Manager Department.Commissioner Coffee spoke.Page 5 of 11411 W. The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Sona Coffee, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 4 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Kirk Kunihiro, Coby Skye and Alan TolkoffEnactment No: S.C. 01-2023Page 6 of 11411 W. 23-008SC.summary: Recommendation to recommend that the City Council amend Long Beach Municipal Code Chapter 2.38 to change the Commission’s name to the Climate Resilient and Sustainable City Commission.Meredith Reynolds, Deputy City Manager, spoke.Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, City Manager Department, spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Gaytan, seconded by Commissioner Gaines, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Sona Coffee, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 4 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Kirk Kunihiro, Coby Skye and Alan Tolkoff6.
